org.jenkinsci.plugins.configfiles.maven..name: StagingSettings
org.jenkinsci.plugins.configfiles.maven..content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <settings> <!--This sends everything else to /public --> <mirrors> <mirror> <id>nexus</id> <mirrorOf>external:*</mirrorOf> <url>http://nexus/content/groups/public</url> </mirror> </mirrors>
<servers> <server> <id>local-nexus</id> <username>${env.NEXUS_USERNAME}</username> <password>${env.NEXUS_PASSWORD}</password> </server> </servers> </settings>
